hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Iron Boots#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Zora Shop#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!
